skills.subtitle: // My Skills
skills.title: Why work with me?
skills.text: I have over 2 years of hands-on experience in web development, building responsive and interactive interfaces. My background includes developing and maintaining WordPress websites, as well as working on academic projects involving CRUD operations and API integration.

about.subtitle: // About Me
about.title: Balance, Code and Creativity
text: I'm a dedicated developer always seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge. Besides my academic background, I enjoy studying by myself to deepen my skills and explore new areas of technology.

Throughout my years as a dev, I've worked on projects with different levels of complexity, and each experience has taught me valuable lessons. I value collaboration and clean code, always aiming for quality and growth.
I'm interested in working with UI/UX and interface design, aiming to create applications that are not only functional but also visually appealing and accessible.

Outside of coding, I look for balance. When I'm not studying or working, I enjoy watching series and spending time with the people I love. These moments help me recharge and return to work with a clearer, more creative mindset â€” ready to take on new challenges!
about.cats: I also love spending time with my cats! They are the perfect little companions during my study sessions.
